metadata.title: CVE-2021-43818 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
lxml is a library for processing XML and HTML in the Python language. Priorto version 4.6.5, the HTML Cleaner in lxml.html lets certain crafted scriptcontent pass through, as well as script content in SVG files embedded usingdata URIs. Users that employ the HTML cleaner in a security relevantcontext should upgrade to lxml 4.6.5 to receive a patch. There are no knownworkarounds available.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-43818` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-lxml - 4.2.1-1ubuntu0.6
python3-lxml - 4.2.1-1ubuntu0.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lxml package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.2.1-1ubuntu0.6').
